send

public boolean send(java.lang.String from,
                    java.lang.String[] to,
                    java.lang.String[] cc,
                    java.lang.String[] bcc,
                    java.lang.String subject,
                    java.lang.String dataAnnotation,
                    DataResults data,
                    java.lang.String attachmentName,
                    java.lang.String attachmentContent)
Sends an email based on parameters. This variant takes as input data and puts it on a html table on the e-mail.

Parameters:
from - the sender address
to - the recipient address
cc - the cc recipient address
bcc - the bcc recipient address
subject - the e-mail subject
text - the body of the e-mail
dataAnnotation - A text to put above the table of data
data - the data to populate the table with
attachmentName - the attachment file name
attachmentContent - the attachment content
Returns:
true if sent successfully or false if not sent

send

                    java.lang.String subject,

Parameters:
from - the sender address
to - the recipient address
cc - the cc recipient address
bcc - the bcc recipient address
subject - the e-mail subject
text - the body of the e-mail
attachmentName - the attachment file name
attachmentContent - the attachment content
Returns:

createMailBodyDataTable

public static java.lang.String createMailBodyDataTable(DataResults data,
                                                       java.lang.String tableAnnotation)
Creates a data table in html form for the body of the email

Parameters:
data - the data from a query
tableAnnotation - a simple annotation to appear above the table
Returns:
the html with the table
